scripts.build-test: npm run clean-test && cd dist && mkdir test && babel ../test -s -d test
scripts.build-routes: npm run clean-routes && cd dist && mkdir routes && babel ../routes -s -d routes
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir dist && babel server.js model/dbConfig.js controllers/QuestionManager.js controllers/QuestionRoutes.js controllers/UserManager.js controllers/UsersRoute.js net/DatabaseManager.js middleware/validateToken.js middleware/validateInputField.js routes/authRoute.js routes/questionRoute.js -s -d dist
scripts.test: npm run dev && npm run clean-test && npm run build-test && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha "dist/test/routes/routeTest.js" --exit
scripts.production: npm run build && npm run build-routes && npm run test && node bin/production
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run build-routes && node bin/production
